docs.snippet: LOS ANGELES  "Rocky," a small-budget film about a small-time boxer's impossible dream to win the heavyweight championship, became a contender for 10 Academy Awards in nominations announced yesterday, a number matched by "Network," a two-fisted sat...
docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES "Rocky," a small-budget film about a small-time boxer's impossible dream to win the heavyweight championship, became a contender for 10 Academy Awards in nominations announced yesterday, a number matched by "Network," a two-fisted satire of the television industry.
docs.abstract: MPAA Oscar nominations announced on Feb 10; major nominations noted (L)

headline.main: 'Rocky' and 'Network' Top Oscars Race; First Stage Is Ended Stooges War Comedy On Sunday Film Bill
